product_name: Goal Zero AAA Rechargeable Batteries - Package of 4
long_description: Couple these four Goal Zero AAA rechargeable batteries with the Nomad 7 solar panel and Guide 10 Plus (sold separately) to breathe new life into them over and over, wherever you wander under the sun.
short_description: Couple these four Goal Zero AAA rechargeable batteries with the Nomad 7 solar panel and Guide 10 Plus (sold separately) to breathe new life into them over and over, wherever you wander under the sun.
